Designing Outdoor Spaces for Inspired Living

Niche Landscapes is focused on designing, building and maintaining nature-informed spaces.

Beautifully Designed

Our designs prioritize aesthetics as well as function, creating visually stunning landscapes that enhance a sense of place.

emoji_nature

Ecological Benefits

We aim to enhance and preserve biodiversity in all of our landscape designs, promoting healthy ecosystems that support a wide range of plant and animal life.

eco

Sustainable Design

Our landscapes are designed with a focus on environmental sustainability, using eco-friendly materials and techniques to minimize the impact on the environment.
